thread.title: George and Amal Clooney expecting twins: reports
thread.title_full: George and Amal Clooney expecting twins: reports | Toronto Star

author: Vjosa Isai
title: George and Amal Clooney expecting twins: reports
text:
George and Amal Clooney may want to share pregnancy notes with Beyoncé and Jay-Z. The Clooneys are expecting twins in June, CBS The Talk host Julie Chen said Thursday. George Clooney told Chen in late January that his wife was pregnant, she said.
The children will be the first for the couple, who married in 2014.
Many in Hollywood are seeing double.
  Not only did Queen Bey announce she is having twins, but popstar Madonna confirmed she adopted twin girls from Malawi.
Many took to social media to congratulate the high-profile human rights attorney Mrs. Clooney, 39, and her acclaimed actor husband, 55.
“Is there anything Amal Clooney CAN’T do?” one user posted.
Hollywood pals also weighed in.
Frequent co-start Matt Damon told Entertainment Tonight Canada he has known about the pregnancy for about a month.
“I was working with him last fall and he pulled me aside on set and I mean, I almost started crying. I was so happy for him,” he said. 
Others commented on the string of star-studded pregnancy announcements, including those of actress Chelsea Peretti and model Rosie Huntington-Whitley.
Clooney’s publicist didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment, and neither he or his wife have publically mentioned the pregnancy.
